ygData.subject: RE: Special foraged foods
ygData.msgSnippet: Why hide?  Maybe you are standing by the tree in CT court yard and need to go afk for just a sec and are too lazy to camp but dont want to be trained? The mobs
ygData.messageBody:
Why hide? Maybe you are standing by the tree in CT court yard and need to
go afk for just a sec and are too lazy to camp but dont want to be trained?
The mobs see thru invis (casters do) and maybe your party has a pet (which
bard invis would kill) and maybe your party used their own invis which bard
invis would kill or maybe you just dont want anybody to see you <g>

Sylly Songsynger
Bard of the 35th Song
<Spirit of the Moon>
somewhere on Innoruuk

p.s. foraged food has that 'gritty' taste - i prefer milk and muffins

-----Original Message-----
From: David Knadler [mailto:dknadler@...]
Sent: Thursday, November 11, 1999 12:31 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Special foraged foods
Importance: Low


From: David Knadler <dknadler@...>

I never hide (why exactly would a bard above 19th use hide), I use forage
religiously. If you use it all the time, you can actually generate quite a
lot of food and water.
